# applicationTokens

**Instance Property**

Tokens that represent applications selected by the user.

## Declaration

```swift
var applicationTokens: Set<ApplicationToken>
```

## Accessing Selected Applications

- **applications**: A set of application instances selected by the user.

items.description: A set of application instances selected by the user.
items.name: applications
